data.text: Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn Moses mɨgei,

“Nɨ Israelian gumazamizibav kemeghtɨ, me 12plan asadivir aghoriba nɨ danɨngightɨ, nɨ 12plan anababar gumazir dapaniba vaghvagh men asadivir aghoriba inigh. Egh 12plan gumazir dapanir kabar ziaba asadivir aghorir kabar da osirigh.
Egh Livain anabamɨn asadivir aghorim, Aronɨn ziam osirigh. Anababar gumazir dapanibar ziaba vaghvagh men asadivir aghoribar ikiam.
Eghtɨ nɨ da inigh, na bativamin Purirpenimɨn mangɨva, kɨ nɨ bativi naghɨn Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavimɨn Boksiamɨn guamɨn da atɨgh.
Eghtɨ gumazir kɨ mɨsevezimɨn asadivim ghuzghugham. Arazir kamɨn, kɨ Israelian imobir me nɨ gasiba, bar da gɨvagham.”

Ezɨ Moses Israelia mɨgeima, men anababar gumazir dapaniba vaghvagha uan asadiviba isa a ganɨngi. Kar, anabar 12plan asadivir aghoriba. Ezɨ Aronɨn asadivir aghorim uaghan men asadivir aghoribar tongɨn iti.
Ezɨ Moses asadivir aghorir kaba bar moghɨra da inigha, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Purirpenimɨn aven ghua, Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavimɨn Boksiamɨn guamɨn boroghɨn da arɨki.

Egha amɨmzaraghan Moses Purirpenimɨn aven ghua garima, asadivir aghorir Aronɨn ziam itim, kar Livain anabamɨn asadivir aghorim, a ghuzir igiaba otivigha akɨmariba onezɨ, amonɨn temer ovɨziba anigha an guighav iti.

Ezɨ Moses ghua Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn damazimɨn asadivir aghoriba bar da inigha azenan ghua Israelian akazɨ, me asadivir aghorir kabar gari. Ezɨ men gumazir dapaniba iza vaghvagha uan asadivir aghoriba isi.

Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God kamaghɨn Moses mɨgei, “Nɨ Aronɨn asadivir aghorim uam a isɨ Akar Dɨkɨrɨzir Gavgavimɨn Boksiamɨn guamɨn boroghɨn anetɨgh. Eghtɨ a fofozim me danɨngamin ikiangsɨzimɨn mɨn ikɨtɨ, Israelian puvɨra na gimoba nan atarir arazim gɨvagham. Eghtɨ me arɨghɨran kogham.”
Ezɨ Moses Ikiavɨra Itir God mɨkemezɨ moghɨram ami.
Ezɨ Israelian gumazamiziba kamaghɨn Moses mɨgei, “Ame! E aremeghasava ami. E bar moghɨra kamaghɨra gɨvagham.
Gumazir manam, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn Purirpenim boroghɨn mangɨva, an aremegham. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, e bar moghɨra ovengamin adarasi.”
